content:
Which HL7 WG participates in discussion of this WHO project?
Updated link - https://www.who.int/news-room/articles-detail/call-for-public-comments-interim-guidance-for-developing-a-smart-vaccination-certificate-release-candidate-1
This topic was moved here from #Announcements > Smart Vaccination Certificate by Josh Mandel
I'm not aware of anything directly tied to this WHO effort, but there's related work in the public health workgroup, for the SMART Health Cards specification.
Isn't SVC a profile of IPS? Who's responsible for IPS?
yes many are using IPS as source for COVID Vaccine proof. But it is not a good solution to 'be' the vaccine proof outside of treatment purpose.
